Title: Places a limit on the annual salary of state officers and employees
Summary: Places a limit on the annual salary of state officers and employees.
LawCode: Amd §130, Civ Serv L; amd Art 1 Title 1 Title head, add §3, Pub Auth L; amd §10, Leg L; add §71-a, Pub Off L; add §90-a, Gen Muni L; amd §30, Exec L; amd §37, Judy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, the public authorities law, the legislative law, the public officers law, the general municipal law, the executive law and the judiciary law, in relation to placing a limit on the annual salary of state officers and employees
